about_the_game:
Get ready to set sail for the fishing expedition of a lifetime in Ultimate Fishing Simulator: Florida DLC! Immerse yourself in the picturesque beauty of Florida's Dry Tortugas, a haven for saltwater fishing enthusiasts. Your very own boat becomes your gateway to adventure as you navigate the inviting waters, revealing a treasure trove of angling hotspots.



From vibrant coral reefs harboring elusive Little tunny and Red drum to deep-sea realms where the colossal Atlantic goliath grouper and stealthy Mahi-mahi await, the variety of fishing spots ensures every cast is a new challenge.

Feel the adrenaline surge as you lock horns with the awe-inspiring Atlantic tarpon, harness the power of the mighty Tiger shark, and test your wits against the cunning Spinner shark. With each catch, you'll discover the unique thrill of reeling in Black sea bass, conquering the fierce Black drum, and chasing the explosive Blackfin tuna.

The breathtaking Florida DLC map is a playground of opportunity, offering you the chance to master the art of angling amidst stunning backdrops. Seek the prized Blue marlin, take on the challenge of Yellowfin tuna, and feel the rush of encountering the notorious Blacktip shark.

With your gear prepped and strategy in mind, cast your line and dive into the heart of Ultimate Fishing Simulator: Florida DLC. Whether you're a weathered fishing veteran or a newcomer, this DLC guarantees an unforgettable voyage into the heart of saltwater fishing excitement.

Fish Species:

  • Black sea bass
  • Black drum
  • Red drum
  • Atlantic tarpon
  • Tiger shark
  • Blacktip shark
  • Little tunny
  • Yellowfin tuna
  • Blackfin tuna
  • Mahi-mahi
  • Atlantic goliath grouper
  • Blue marlin
  • Spinner shark
  • Gray snapper
  • Red lionfish
  • Great barracuda

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-2400 or Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-6400 or Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 4GB VRAM or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Unleash your inner angler in Ultimate Fishing Simulator: Florida DLC! Sail to Dry Tortugas, snag Black sea bass, Tarpon, and more on your own boat. Adventure awaits!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
